author: Tom Macy
description: As per the original, I've used a bottled-in-bond strength rye whiskey but some may want to add a splash more of it to this well-balanced Manhattan-style cocktail.
name: Bay Ridge
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
7.5 ml La Vieille Prune plum brandy

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
